title: Forecast Google Glass unit sales 2014 to 2018
summary: Overall Unit sales in millions has increased over the Year.
Unit sales in millions is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The line drastically increased by 2.8 times from Year 2016 to 2017, and lastly, increased by 2.0 times from Year 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Unit sales in millions, about 21.15 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Unit sales in millions, of value 3.74 was reported at Year 2016
